instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 No keyboard/Trackpad/Camera/Thunderbolt
threads.message:
Hi
Got an 820-4924 here, no signs of corrosion/ liquid damage
The keyboard and trackpad first off worked intermittently, but now have failed completely.
Diagnosis picks up issues with both thunderbolt and the camera, I did have one run where thunderbolt didnt show any problems so again id assume some intermittency. 

I have a feeling these issues are all tied together somehow but im unsure how.
Any ideas?

threads.title: 820-4924 No keyboard/Trackpad/Camera/Thunderbolt
threads.message: Checked supply voltages to any of these devices? Checked if camera is really dead in OSX?

threads.title: 820-4924 No keyboard/Trackpad/Camera/Thunderbolt
threads.message:
Main thing im concerned about it keyboard and trackpad for now.
Power to the keyboard and trackpad is all good.
Diode mode on the trackpad connector checked and all looks good compared to a known good board

threads.title: 820-4924 No keyboard/Trackpad/Camera/Thunderbolt
threads.message: I assume you tried another trackpad cable, they are very common failure.
